Name: bulk carrier production, for dry goods | bulk carrier, for dry goods | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/301:Building of ships and boats/3011:Building of ships and floating structures
Description: The data represents one bulk carrier with load capacity of 51,000 tonnes. The deadweight as percent of total displacement of an average bulk liquid carrier is estimated to be 82% (from the range given in Papanikolaou (2014)) (needed to calculate the ship lightweight mass).;Reference:;Papanikolaou, A. (2014) Ship Design: Methodologies for Preliminary Design Springer: Athens, Greeces
